title.rendered: ULTRALOQ UB01 UBOLT + BRIDGE WIFI ADAPTOR

content.rendered:
Ultraloq Bridge allows you to unlock, share eKeys to your guests for scheduled access, and view access logs from anywhere.

Features

  • Connectivity : Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Smart), 2.4GHz 802.11 (b/g/n) WiFi
  • Power : 100-240V, 50-60Hz, 0.1A, Standard North American power outlet
  • Requirements : 1 Ultraloq Bridge for each Ultraloq smart lock, iOS (9.0 or higher) or Android (5.0 or higher) smartphones, U-tec app
